name: Blocky (itch) (BT Games)
description:
You play as Pinky a block trying to find home while avoiding obstacles with his best friend Jimy (Spelt like that on purpose) until Jimy gets lost.

There is 3 diffrent areas, Foggy Skys, Busy City, and Under A Rock, and there is 20 levels in total.

The obstacles range from a rectangle to houses and cars to even rocks!

You can play splitscreen with a friend using "A" and "D" for P1 and  "<" and ">" for P2

The game runs on MacOS and Windows.

(Please leave reviews and feedback in the new community page)
